mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENTS WHERE MOVIE_TITLE = #{movieTitle} AND MOVIE_YEAR = #{movieYear} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NVL(ROUND(SUM(RATING)/COUNT(*),1),0) FROM MOVIE_RATING WHERE MOVIE_TITLE = #{movieTitle} AND MOVIE_YEAR = #{movieYear}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE_RATING ( MEMBER_NO, RATING, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_YEAR ) VALUES ( #{memberNo}, #{rating}, #{movieTitle}, #{movieYear} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, COMMENT_NO, C.COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(C.COMMENT_ENROLLDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "COMMENTENROLLDATE", C.SPOILER, C.COMMENT_REPORT, C.MOVIE_TITLE, C.MOVIE_YEAR, M.NICK_NAME, L.COMMENT_LIKE, L.COMMENT_DISLIKE, R.RATING FROM COMMENTS C JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN (SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN COMMENT_LIKE='Y' THEN 1 END) COMMENT_LIKE, COUNT(CASE WHEN COMMENT_DISLIKE='Y' THEN 1 END) COMMENT_DISLIKE, COMMENT_NO FROM COMMENT_LIKE GROUP BY COMMENT_NO) L USING (COMMENT_NO) JOIN MOVIE_RATING R USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.STATUS='Y' AND C.MOVIE_TITLE=#{movieTitle} AND C.MOVIE_YEAR=#{movieYear} AND ROWNUM < 4 ORDER BY L.COMMENT_LIKE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO COMMENTS ( COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, SPOILER, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_YEAR, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMNO.NEXTVAL, #{commentContent}, #{spoiler}, #{movieTitle}, #{movieYear}, #{memberNo} ) INTO COMMENT_LIKE (COMMENT_WRITER, COMMENT_LIKE, COMMENT_DISLIKE, COMMENT_NO ) VALUES ( #{memberNo}, 'N', 'N', SEQ_COMNO.CURRVAL ) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENT_LIKE SET COMMENT_LIKE = #{commentLike}, COMMENT_DISLIKE = 'N' WHERE COMMENT_NO=#{commentNo} AND COMMENT_WRITER=#{commentWriter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT_LIKE ( COMMENT_WRITER, COMMENT_LIKE, COMMENT_DISLIKE, COMMENT_NO ) VALUES ( #{commentWriter}, 'Y', 'N', #{commentNo} )
INSERT INTO COMMENT_LIKE ( COMMENT_WRITER, COMMENT_LIKE, COMMENT_DISLIKE, COMMENT_NO ) VALUES ( #{commentWriter}, 'N', 'Y', #{commentNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_LIKE, COMMENT_DISLIKE FROM COMMENT_LIKE WHERE COMMENT_WRITER = #{memberNo} AND COMMENT_NO IN (SELECT COMMENT_NO FROM COMMENTS WHERE MOVIE_TITLE=#{movieTitle} AND MOVIE_YEAR=#{movieYear} ) ORDER BY COMMENT_LIKE DESC
